      • toJsonNode

        com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode toJsonNode()
        toJsonNode is useful for doing deep copies and translations to avoid full serialization into strings.
        Returns:
        An ObjectNode cast as JsonNode representation of the full object. This method does NOT provide security filtering.
